name: Life as A Square v0.1 (Beta)
description:
This is beta PLEASE DONT COMPLAIN ABOUT THE GRAPHICS.

Hi, welcome to Life as A Square. You are just a little square casually walking around and doing everyday activities like - dodging spikes? Enjoy INTENSE adventures and stuff. BTW story mode is probably coming soon.

This is a beta, so don't complain about the graphics. I'm just releasing this because I want to know if people actually like it. I'm sure there are 1000s of bugs that need to be fixed. Please report them in the comments.

In the full release (I hope) there will be better graphics, more levels, more mechanics and bug fixes.

I hope you enjoy!!
